panels.description: The uptime of the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Process Uptime

panels.description: The starttime of the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Process Start Time

panels.description:
The number of logical threads. e.g. If you have hyper-threading on, this will be double the number of cores. verify running the below cmd
sysctl -n machdep.cpu.core_count
panels.title: Processor Count

panels.description: Returns the system load average for the last minute. The system load average is the sum of the number of runnable entities queued to the getAvailableProcessors available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time. The way in which the load average is calculated is operating system specific but is typically a damped time-dependent average
panels.title: CPU Load

panels.description: The sum of the number of runnable entities queued to available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time
panels.title: Average System Load
